title: MVP's Free Throws
question_text:
A large company hosts a recreational basketball league for its employees. At an evening practice in the local park, 20 of the male employees practice free throw shots. As a boost to morale, the CEO of the company invites an MVP, most valuable player, from the recent National Basketball Association's Championship to shoot free throws with them.
Which of the histograms shows the most likely distribution of the number of free throws made by the 20 male employees and the MVP?
